name: Movie Taglines II Quiz | Movie Taglines | 15 Questions

questions.explanation:
Empire Records & Empire Record.

	Starring Liv Tyler, Anthony LaPaglia, Rory Cochrane, Johnny Whitworth, Renee Zellweger, Robin Tunney, Ethan Randall (now Embry), and Maxwell Caulfield.

questions.text: 'What a glorious feeling!' Starring Gene Kelly
questions.correct: Singin' In The Rain & Singing In The Rain & Singin In The Rain
questions.explanation:
Singin' In The Rain & Singing In The Rain & Singin In The Rain.

	Starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald O'Connor, Jean Hagen, and Millard Mitchell.

questions.correct: Ever After & Ever After: A Cinderella Story & Ever After A Cinderella Story
questions.explanation:
Ever After & Ever After: A Cinderella Story & Ever After A Cinderella Story.

	Starring Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott, Melanie Lynskey, and Patrick Godfrey.

questions.text: 'Ever wanted to be someone else? Now you can.' Starring John Cusack
questions.explanation:
Being John Malkovich.

	Starring John Cusack, Cameron Diaz, Catherine Keener, and John Malkovich.

questions.text: 'A comedy about finding your heart and losing your head.' Starring Julia Roberts
questions.explanation:
My Best Friend's Wedding.

	Starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Cameron Diaz, and Rupert Everett.

questions.text: 'Allen Bauer thought he'd never find the right woman. He was only half-wrong!' Starring Tom Hanks
questions.explanation:
Splash.

	Starring Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah, Eugene Levy, and John Candy.

questions.text: 'First comes love. Then comes the interrogation.' Starring Ben Stiller
questions.explanation:
Meet The Parents.

	Starring Ben Stiller, Robert De Niro, Teri Polo, and Blythe Danner.

questions.text: 'They thought they'd be friends forever, but forever couldn't last.' Starring Rob Lowe
questions.correct: St. Elmo's Fire & St. Elmos Fire & Saint Elmo's Fire & Saint Elmos Fire
questions.explanation:
St. Elmo's Fire & St. Elmos Fire & Saint Elmo's Fire & Saint Elmos Fire

	Starring Rob Lowe, Demi Moore, Andrew McCarthy, Judd Nelson, Ally Sheedy, Emilio Estevez, and Mare Winningham.

questions.text: 'In the heart of suburbia, a hitman with a heart has just moved in. ' Starring Bruce Willis
questions.explanation:
The Whole Nine Yards.

	Starring Bruce Willis, Matthew Perry, Amanda Peet, Natasha Henstridge, and Rosanna Arquette.

questions.text: 'In one small bottle... the fountain of youth. The secret of eternal life. The power of an ancient potion. Sometimes it works... sometimes it doesn't.' Starring Meryl Streep
questions.explanation:
Death Becomes Her.

	Starring Meryl Streep, Goldie Hawn, Bruce Willis, and Isabella Rosselini.

questions.correct: Strike & Strike! & All I Wanna Do & All I Want To Do & The Hairy Bird & Hairy Bird
questions.explanation:
Strike & Strike! & All I Wanna Do & All I Want To Do & The Hairy Bird & Hairy Bird.

	Starring Kirsten Dunst, Lynn Redgrave, Gaby Hoffman, Monica Keena, and Rachael Leigh Cook.

questions.text: 'Not all girls want to play with dolls.' Starring Heather Matazzaro
questions.explanation:
Welcome To The Dollhouse.

	Starring Heather Matazzaro.

questions.text: 'It takes a strong man to save himself, and a great man to save another.' Starring Tim Robbins
questions.explanation:
The Shawshank Redemption & Shawshank Redemption.

	Starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman.

questions.text: 'Once in a lifetime you get a chance to do something different.' Starring Tom Hanks
questions.correct: A League Of Their Own & League Of Their Own
questions.explanation:
A League Of Their Own & League Of Their Own.

	Starring Tom Hanks, Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Madonna, Rosie O'Donnell, and Jon Lovitz.

questions.text: 'Lust. Seduction. Revenge. The game as you've never seen it played before.' Starring Glenn Close
questions.explanation:
Dangerous Liaisons.

	Starring Glenn Close, John Malkovich, Michelle Pfeiffer, Uma Thurman, and Keanu Reeves.
